basics.name: Hugo Garrido-Lestache
basics.label: Senior Computer Science Student
basics.summary: Senior CS student at MSOE; dual-enrolled in M.S. Machine Learning. Interested in AI and reinforcement learning with research and industry experience.

work.name: MSOE
work.summary: Worked in a research project exploring how to improve collaboration in multi agent system
highlights: Worked on a research project with a professor from MSOE, Jeremy Kedziora.
Developing Reinforcement Learning Algorithms to promote Collaboration in Multi-Agent Environments.
Got State-of-the-art Performance on a soccer environment and tower building environment.
Presented at a computing symposium and published a paper.
Came 1st in the MSOE NVIDIA ROSIE Competition winning over $9,000 in prizes.

work.name: Direct Supply
work.summary: Built and improved AI systems for product data: web scraping, linking, and tagging.
highlights: AI Product Web Scraper: Created an AI tool to search, parse and combine unstructured data on the internet to augment the company’s quality and quantity of data.
AI Product Linking: Improved AI systems to match products together based on semantic similarity.
AI Product Tagging: Created a System to add tags/attributes to products automatically based on product data. This data can be used to group and filter products and feed future AI Models.
Developed and Deployed to AWS Full-Stack (FastAPI/React) web applications prototypes.
Heavily utilized OpenAI and Groq, pre-trained LLMs and Embedding models.

work.name: MSOE
work.summary: Tutored ~20 students weekly in programming concepts.

volunteer.summary: Mentored members on AI concepts; members built CNNs on chosen datasets.
Planned events and taught skills to scouts (20–25 youth).

awards.title: 1st in NVIDIA ROSIE Supercomputer Challenge
awards.summary: Won the ROSIE competition; over $9,000 in prizes.

publications.name: Enhancing Multi-Agent Collaboration with Attention-Based Actor-Critic Policies
publications.summary: Published a paper on a research project exploring how to improve collaboration in multi agent system
